name: whatsapp-bot
description: Please star the bot if you like it

MODS.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma ",")

MONGO_URI.description: A secret String for Mongodb Connection.(Required)

GOOGLE_API_KEY.description: Google API key for Google searches (Not Required)

TENOR_API_KEY.description: A key used for gif searches
